entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Guid Marshalling Support #87894
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_72133/Runtime_72133/Runtime_72133.dll #87888
    8.0.0
  • iOSNativeAOT app build failing #87886
  • The environment variable "DOTNET_TC_CallCountThreshold" should be configurable via runtimeconfig #87885
  • Generate UUID-5 in FIPS-140-3 mode using SHA-1\MD-5 (RFC-4122) #87884
  • Add test to confirm the general purpose bit flag is unset when no encoding is specified in ZipArchive #87882
    8.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessor` works on non-static methods #87881
  • `JIT/jit64/opt/rngchk/RngchkStress2.cs` failing to build with `error CS8078: An expression is too long or complex to compile` #87879
  • [wasm] Blazor project failing to publish on windows due to a unicode character in the path #87877
    8.0.0
  • (Blazor.WASM) Cannot use Debug when using generic attribute #87871
  • ILStrip failure for FsToolkit.ErrorHandling(Must be of type CilStrip.Mono.Cecil.TypeReference) #87867
  • [TestFailure] GetAsync_SetAutomaticDecompression_ContentDecompressed_Deflate (Gateway Timeout) #87864
  • .NET Version: 6.0.0 Fatal Error The process was terminated due to an internal error in the .NET Runtime * with exit code 80131506(ExecutionEngineException?) #87858
  • [Wasm] Profiled AOT fails on System.IO invocations #87856
  • AVX-512 debugger support: view registers #87854
    Future

Closed

  • Publish NativeAOT compiler with NativeAOT #67742
    8.0.0
  • gcc fails to arch-cross-compile on GNU/Linux in NativeAOT .NET 7 #78559
    8.0.0
  • .Net NativeAOT doesn't generate System.Net.Security.Native lib #87701
  • `PublishTrimmed` causing `dotnet publish` to hang #86379
  • Problem with interception StandardOutput in Linux #73923
    Future
  • Issue with zip headers general purpose flags bit 11 for OPC packages. #87658
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: InstrumentRecorder - notification of new measurements #86783
    Future
  • Reduce duplication between InstrumentRecorder and MeterCollector #87243
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: More granular control over properties during (de)serialization with System.Text.Json #87875
  • [API Proposal]: Expose options to only generate one direction for generated COM interfaces #86360
    8.0.0
  • ILLink+NativeAOT testing integration #70395
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 PublishReadyToRun causes crash when publishing, but it worked on .NET 6 #78278
    7.0.x
  • why i add dotnet to path but application with --no-self-contained cannot run #87819
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails for covariant properties when [JsonIgnore] is specified #63443
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.SourceGenerator failed to generate with custom array attribute value on property #81124
    8.0.0
  • System.AccessViolationException occurring in managed code on dotnet 7 #83242
    8.0.0
  • Crash when `GetHashCode` is called under specific circumstances #87551
  • System.Configuration.TypeUtil.GetImplicitType #84244
    Future
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #87814
  • [API Proposal]: HttpRequestOptions should implement IReadOnlyDictionary #68149
    Future
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement collation native functions #86699
  • Blazor ValidationMessage does not respect the display annotation #86595
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TotalProcessorTime_PerformLoop_TotalProcessorTimeValid #86739
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Bump main to Preview 7 #87893
    area-Infrastructure
  • Auto generate Event Ids in the logging source gen #87892
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2206720 #87891
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][perf] Remove unused _LinkerFlagsToDrop property from the sample app #87889
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move NTAuthentication/NegotiateStreamPal back to the mothership #87887
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [hot_reload] Give more info about why the runtime can't apply updates #87880
    area-EnC-mono
  • Optimizes vector conversions with AVX512 #87878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (4/n) #87876
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Ensure Min/Max APIs are handled for float in VN #87872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Insert writebacks more eagerly #87869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support filtering property names on dictionary deserialization #87868
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Test-only PR for custom perfmap and diagnostic ipc locations #87859
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Disable promotion for splitted args #87855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Merged

  • Remove InstrumentRecorder class #87873
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Update WCF package versions #87787
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][debugger] Concurrency on execution context dictionary #87870
    area-Debugger-mono
  • System.IO.Packaging: Avoid setting the general purpose bitflag due to enforced UTF8 encoding on ZipArchive creation #87883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc build+test fixes #87830
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement unidirectional GeneratedComInterface options #87831
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix typos in Process.cs #87683
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Don't create type loader for apps that don't need it #87678
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update HP libunwind to v1.7.0 #87426
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Include liblog in linker command line for Bionic #87862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert HttpListener to use public NegotiateAuthentication API #86956
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix support for JsonSerializerContext contained in arbitrary types. #87829
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Stop allocating address exposed locals if they are unreferenced #87790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix how jitrollingbuild disable Component Governance #87853
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix ID regression in Alpine Linux builds #86804
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add support for net8.0-browser TFM to WASM sdk #87866
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Enabling some Vector4 methods as Intrinsics on arm64. #87684
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, implement store methods #87828
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Avoid doing copy propagation on ldaddr for gsharedvt vari… #87713
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Added Vector128 intrinsics that depend on Vector64 for arm64 #87765
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix PlatformDetection.IsThreadingSupported #87863
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: HTML escape lines inside diffs #87861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix expected analyzer layout in nuget packages #87860
    area-Meta
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • fixing an assert in GetGCMemoryInfo #87848
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Apply iteration work limits to X509 certificate loading #87514
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0-preview6] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.8 #87896
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Logging middleware #87550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add support for including System.Index and System.Range downlevel within dotnet/runtime #87840
    area-Meta
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Adjust determinism tests to store away the 2 different binaries that are generated #87852
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Refactor how diagnostics work in the interop generators #87700
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Block "Convert To LibraryImport" in more unsupported cases #87503
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • QUIC ALPN list narrowing down scenario test #86659
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add IStartupHostedService #87335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [WIP] enable regions for MacOS #87421
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix float to int/uint casting behavior #86941
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Try adding cross-compilers for Musl #87841
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Expand interpreter PackedSimd support #87719
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono] Do not ignore non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #87406
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Fix invalid datetimeoffset parsing #87801
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Induce more physical promotions #87810
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    area-Host, 7.0.x
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve dynamic heap count #87619
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement Stopwatch.ToString() #87812
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add custom hosts file support to Dns #87832
    area-System.Net
  • [DO NOT MERGE][mono] try to interrupt Monitor.Wait #87836
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Managed ABI #2214

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Double-align the shadow frame when necessary #2315

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable more tests and fix more bugs #2308
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pass GC values in LLVM/WASM registers #2312
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not use helpers for long div/mod/mul #2314
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows runtimes are showing in Linux SDK tarball #33472
  • Cannot createa universal macos binaries (x64+arm) #33469

Closed

  • MSBuild property ArtifactsPath is overloaded; used by both .Net 8 and Microsoft.Build.Artifacts #33052
  • Add tests validating bundled Source Link #33297

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Updating branding to preview 7 #33475
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When Hot Reload change fails to apply in the browser send full error … #33471
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the existing NETSDK 1045 error message to link to the download page #33446
    untriaged

Merged

  • Prevent built-in artifacts output functionality from conflicting with Microsoft.Build.Artifacts SDK #33470
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Embed browser static web assets into non browser TFM #33444
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update ValleySoft.DockerCredsProvider to get better support for podman authentication #33038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: add mappings for s390x and ppc64le platform architectures to corresponding rids. #33280
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Default container image tags to latest instead of versions #33132
    Area-Containers
  • Containers: Registry: support pulling from quay.io. #33266
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33436
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add a unique error message when workloads are disabled but a customer is trying to use workloads #33406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support setting workload set versions in global.json #33441
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix workload cache security descriptors #33322
    untriaged
  • Do not look in root for .`config\dotnet-tools.json ` manifest for windows #33282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Enable multi-RID and multi-project containerization #33166
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    Area-Containers
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection literals: update type inference #7284
  • Add include disclaimer for speclets #7292
  • Clarify how *ref-safe-to-escape*/*safe-to-escape* are calculated for inline array operations. #7272

Updated

  • Add speclet for `ref readonly` parameters #7165

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntelliSense surfacing unrelated extension methods #68720
  • Public API changes for InlineArrays feature #68719
  • CS8618 Gives a misleading or confusing message #68716
  • Assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68714
  • Bad performance from CoreWF - no fast way to create a LambdaExpression from VB script code #68712
  • Consider caching `Locations` instead of allocating a new array each time it's accessed #68710
  • EnC: changing parameter suppresses method body analysis #68708

Closed

  • Edit → Format document replaces tabs with spaces when `indent_style = tab` #68709

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish additional package and TFM for razor testing #68725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Log perf telemetry for LSP completion handler #68724
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Crossgen for .NET 8 #68721
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't expose MS.VS.LanguageServer.Protocol types from EA.Razor #68713
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix SuppressMessage attributes working on primary constructors #68706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce number of iterations for LongInitializers test #68723
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Report exceptions thrown in callbacks in Workspace.SetCurrentSolutionAsync #68722
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Fix variable capture analysis in presense of parameter changes #68699
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into InlineArrays #68717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move ref readonly parameter tests to one file #68711
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Ensure VisualStudioOptionPersister is only created once #68701
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations for LocalScopeBinder.BuildLocals #68684
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Primary Constructors: Implement double storage warning for field initializers #68662
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

Updated

  • Add ReportIVTs compiler mode #68665
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Update handling of collection literals with no target type #68598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Collection literals: type inference #68703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • target and crossgen servicehub binaries for .NET 8 #68698
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ExternalAccess API for interceptors #68652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Compiler.Next
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add AddServerComponents() to Blazor Web App project template #48952
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48951
  • Misleading documentation for UseBlazorFrameworkFiles("path") #48950
  • Customize location of JavascriptInitializer javascript #48949
  • Before hitting the database, check if the refresh ticket is at least 5m old and reject it or return the same token. This will help mitigate refresh loops on the client side. #48947
  • DataProtectionProvider should expose a Create method which only takes setupAction #48944
  • Published site fails to load (Internal Server Error 500) when publishing ASP.NET Core API to SCD. #48941
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23316.32] Blazor component property doesn't recognize [Parameter] attribute when setting [SupplyParameterFromQuery] attribute together #48937
    8.0-preview6
  • Consider adding Progressive Web App option to the Blazor Web App template #48935
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Quarantine WebSocket_Abort_Interrupts_Pending_ReceiveAsync #48933
  • macOS uses port 5000 #48932
  • {project}.style.css in Blazor project can not be load when running dotnet watch, but it can be load at debugging #48929

Closed

  • Implicit binding of parameters from DI services is not working with RDG #48928
    8.0-preview6
  • Give error if SSR root component has prerendering explicitly disabled #48847
    8.0-rc2
  • Add token refresh endpoints to identity #47228
    8.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48938
  • Blazor Server hosted behind Azure Frontdoor wrong BaseUri #48909
  • Surface option in the Blazor Web App template for server interactivity #48626
    8.0-preview6
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc is getting depreciated but what would be workaround? #48920
  • Harmonize the Blazor WebAssembly SDK + the .NET WASM SDK #46673
    8.0-preview6
  • Swagger ui's example value/scheme doesn't respect JsonConverters #48802
  • Progressive enhancement of form submission & navigation #46399
    8.0-preview6
  • Preserve existing DOM elements when updating streaming SSR content #47258
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor SSR progressive enhancement integration with navigation #48761
    8.0-preview6
  • QuickGrid: Full support for localization #45556
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Set Hot Reload controlling headers DOTNET-MODIFIABLE-ASSEMBLIES and A… #48953
    area-blazor
  • Callsite rendermodes, earlier implementation #48948
    area-blazor
  • Clean up naming and layout for the new Blazor weather page #48940
    area-mvc
  • Fix 48934 test quarantine. #48936
    area-runtime
  • Replace InstrumentRecorder with MetricCollector #48931
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    feature-output-caching, area-middleware, 8.0-preview6
  • Don't resolve JsonTypeInfo for service parameters #48930
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview6
  • Give error if the root component is interactive. Fixes #48847 #48945
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Remove hosted option from blazor wasm template #48922
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Remove Blazor Server template #48615
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview6
  • Send CloseMessage from client to server #48577
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview6
  • Add refresh token support to BearerTokenHandler #48595
    area-identity, 8.0-preview6
  • Unhide server option in blazor web template #48838
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Progressively enhanced form posts #48939
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Add server option for seamless reconnect #48789
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview6
  • Improve WebApplication debugging #48827
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6
  • Quarantine WebSocket_Abort_Interrupts_Pending_ReceiveAsync #48934
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Update milestones for August servicing #48782
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • feat: Add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48662
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Q: How to use / install dotnet-dump where the dotnet runtime is not installed globally #4006
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-dump threadpool and threadpoolqueue clarification #4003
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [Question] How to analyze deadlock of well-known SynchronizationContext via 'dotnet-dump analyze' command #3885

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI with Blazor in a separate library -> 404 on static files #15779
  • CollectionView.SelectionChanged gets fired if a CollectionView.SwipeView is added to ItemTemplate [ANDROID] #15778
  • Compiling a simple, basic, barebones Maui Xaml file (App.xaml.cs located in Platform -> Windows folder) that uses a minimal custom IMarkupExtension Fails to Compile, giving the Error, XamlCompiler error WMC0015: Cannot assign 'StringResourceXamlMarkupExtension' into property 'Text', type must be assignable to 'String' #15775

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change IStateManager.StartTrackingFromQuery to use ISnapshot instead of ValueBuffer #31117
  • Check constraints not being re-enabled for some tables #31115
  • ArgumentNullException when Where + OrderBy + GroupBy + ToListAsync #31114
  • Json serializer options for json columns #31113

Closed

  • EF primitive collection - nested string comparison operations #31030
    Backlog
  • ValueGenerated.OnAddOrUpdate doesn't work #31096
  • Scaffolding: Allow arbitrary SQL hint to be passed as parameter #31061
  • Set query filters on navigation properties #31058
  • HasConversion for DbContext wide #31034
  • Are there any best practices for seeding data only on a given environment? #31018
  • Cosmos: Is it possible to re-add the Discriminator constraint when using FromSqlRaw on specific set? #30997
  • Would `DbSet<TEntity>.Remove(null)` throw? #31108

PullRequests

Merged

  • Partial fix to type mapping inference for primitive collections #31110
  • Additional cleanup and modernization #31084

Updated

  • Add complex types to Metadata #31003
  • Update SDK #31106

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16780
  • Update the table to include preview 6 #16778
  • Preview7 branding #16777

  • Exclude Windows components from sdk diff #16765
  • Update poison-usage baseline #16775
  • Set OmniSharp run script to be executable #16772
  • Revert "Add `llvm-project` VMR source mapping" #16771
  • Pull in msbuild fixes to eliminate source-build prebuilts #16770
  • Replace rdfind invocation with Task that replaces duplicate files with links. #16624
  • Add `llvm-project` VMR source mapping #16768
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16762

Updated

  • Add a source-build smoke test for native debug symbols #16488
    Area-SourceBuild
  • remove .net framework containizerization assets when building non-Windows SDKs #16764
  • source-build: build llvm-project. #16757
